title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Apr 13 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Apr 13 2022
description:
Brooklyn subway gunman posted unhinged race-obsessed YouTube clips. The liberal Drive-By media refused to talk about the motive in the Waukesha mass murder at a Christmas parade, and the same thing will happen now with the vile racist Brooklyn subway shooter. Clay says: "Just for a moment, think about how this story would be being covered if this were a white guy." Two more weeks (to slow the spread) of mask mandates on planes, trains. Pilot named Clay calls in, tells Clay about annual "Clay Convention" and confirms pilots in many regards are final say on planes regarding non-mask wearer ejections. The View’s Sunny Hostin doesn't want to get on a plane with unmasked people "breathing on me with their covid breath." Buck reminds that this is another multimillionaire treating others like they are dirty peasants.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
